text:
Does anyone know why the update fails even if the WinRE partition doesn't exist
and WinRE is disabled (you can check this by running "reagentc /info")? 
Isn't a machine in that case not vulnerable? Why, then, is Windows trying to
install the patch and failing? 
Ben Yuly 
Assistant Director, Operations 
Technology Services
The Catholic University of America
(202) 319-6408
Technology Services On-Call: (202)670-3122 
[https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/mail-sig/AIorK4wInSKf_pj6yBdmr8b8mh3WH7g6qvRLlImWXzGetMsUwgmku-pJZX1G8fBnQNUFjngcpr13T4k]

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
